abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Bauxite Industry
            Technical Assistance Project will be to provide a basis for
            assessing the medium- to long-term economic and financial
            viability of the bauxite industry and, as appropriate,
            assist in the preparation of a full scale rehabilitation
            project. The proposed project will consist of four basic
            components. They include (i) a product development program
            which will include a market study for new products and a
            pilot plant for new refractory products; (ii) a cost control
            program; (iii) marketing support, technical assistance, and
            training; and (iv) an alternative fuel study.
